description: Public works and government services Canada has a requirement ===== please note that all attachments requested have been added to this bundle, only the included notice shall be met via Attachments website=====
full_summary:
### Asphalt Paving Contract Announcement

**Title**
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of various quantities of meat, fish, and poultry products.
**Reference Number**
WS3930664986-Doc3941813767
**Publication Date**
28 April 2023
**Tender Closing Date**
22 June 2023, at 14:00:00 hours
**Tender Status**
Expired
### DPSC Contracting Entity

*DPSC (Department of Public Works and Government Services) is the contracting authority.*
### Procurement Overview

A Regional Master Standing Offer is being solicited for the supply, delivery, and offloading of meat, fish, and poultry products. This 6-month contract has been divided into 6 events. Canadian content restrictions apply to meat items. Bidders can submit proposals for any period of their choice.

### Scope of Work
Meat and poultry products will be supplied, delivered, and offloaded as requested by the Government of Canada, broken down into six separate events.
* Unspsc Description: Meat and Poultry Products: This contract includes the supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of meat and poultry products.
* Unspsc Description: Minimally Processed Meat and Poultry Products: This contract includes the supply, delivery, and offloading of minimally processed meat and poultry products.
* Unspsc Description: Processed Meat and Poultry Products: This contract includes the supply, delivery, and offloading of processed meat and poultry products.
### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
#### Contact Information
Please contact Andrew MacFarlane at [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
